historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-350, see notes under § 2-591.

DC CODE § 2-593

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Report annually, on or before February 1, on its activities, including recommendations for changes in the law;
Issue advisory opinions to public bodies on compliance with subchapter IV of this chapter;
Provide training to public bodies, officials, and employees related to subchapter IV of this chapter; and
Issue rules to implement the provisions of this subchapter and subchapter IV of this chapter.
The Open Government Office may bring suit to enforce § 2-579.
The Open Government Office may issue advisory opinions on implementation of subchapter II of this chapter.

heading.catch_text: Powers and duties of the Open Government Office.
